title: Application Crashes and Freezing
description: Fix software crashes, freezing, and performance issues.

steps.title: Force Close Application
steps.instruction: Windows: Ctrl+Shift+Esc → Task Manager → Select app → End Task. Mac: Cmd+Option+Esc → Force Quit.

steps.title: Restart Application
steps.instruction: Close the application completely and reopen it. Check if the issue persists.

steps.title: Check for Updates
steps.instruction: Open the application and check for software updates. Install any available updates.

steps.title: Clear Application Cache
steps.instruction: Clear temporary files and cache for the application. Location varies by software.

steps.title: Restart Computer
steps.instruction: Save all work and restart your computer to clear memory and background processes.
